statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 25
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND age > 21 ORDER BY age ASC, customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS num_campaigns FROM ad_campaigns GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE customer_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age >= 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%D%' ORDER BY customer_age ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_age DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_content FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Banner';
SELECT ad_id, clicks, revenue FROM ad_performance WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_performance.clicks FROM ads INNER JOIN ad_performance ON ads.ad_id = ad_performance.ad_id;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT ad_name, target_audience, cost FROM ads WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, target_audience, duration, cost FROM ads WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE impressions > 500 AND clicks > 50;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%target%' OR description LIKE '%promotions%' ORDER BY segment_id;
